name: simplifr
description: Simplifies JSON into flat single-level path-value structure. Designed for React/Redux apps.

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'` && rollup -f umd -n simplifr --banner "/* Simplifr, v${VERSION} */" -o build/simplifr.js -- index.js && npm run uglify

author: Tin Skipor
